org.mixare.plugin

Class PluginLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mixare.plugin.PluginLoader

  • public class PluginLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    Searches, loads and executes available plugins that are installed on the device.
    Author:
    A.Egal
